author: Justin Enriquez For Dailymail.Com
title: Naomie Harris leads the way at Independent Spirit Awards | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Wow factor: The dress had slits down the side which gave a peek at her toned torso and even a bit of sideboob Gorgeous: She showed off her mile-high long legs in the short number which she finished off with a pair of black and white heels and dangling earrings Owning it: Her brunette tresses were worn down flowing over her shoulders as she let her natural looks show with minimal make-up She showed off her mile-high long legs in the short number which she finished off with a pair of black and white heels and dangling earrings. Her brunette tresses were worn down flowing over her shoulders as she let her natural looks show with minimal make-up. Ruth, 35, rocked an interesting midi featuring a golden skirting with flowers embroidered all over it as the top of the dress was black and had puffed-out sleeves. Dizzying: Janelle Monae sported a chic black and white outfit consisting of both houndstooth and striped patterns Gorgeous girls: Janelle posed with Kerry on the blue carpet Wonder in white: Taraji P. Henson looked absolutely stunning Flowy: The 46-year-old spun around her long skirt It's Cookie! Taraji hammed it up on the blue carpet Her curly locks were elegantly disheveled as her make-up was highlighted by blue eyeshadow and shiny pink lip. One notable person missing in action was Natalie Portman, who is nominated for Best Actress for her work on Jackie, as will be unable to attend tonight's event as well as The Oscars. 'Due to my pregnancy, I am unable to attend the Independent Spirit Awards and the Academy Awards,' the heavily pregnant star told the Hollywood Reporter . Flower power: Ruth, 35, rocked an interesting midi featuring a golden skirting with flowers embroidered all over it as the top of the dress was black and had puffed-out sleeves Dynamic duo: She was joined by Colin Firth on the blue carpet more videos
